title: Hello My Teacher (K-Drama)
description:
Title : Hello My Teacher
Alternative Title(s) :Geon-bbang-seon-saeng-kwa Byeol-sa-tang / Hardtack Teacher and Star Candy (YesAsia) / Biscuit Teacher and Star Candy
Hardsubbed or Softsubbed: Softsubbed
Resolution: 640x480
English Subtitles: Yes
Number of Episodes: 16
Date Aired (YYYY-MM-DD): 2005-Apr-13 to 2005-Jun-02
More Info: http://wiki.d-addicts.com/Hello_My_Teacher


Summary: Na Bori (Gong Hyo Jin) is a 25 year old woman who desperately wants to be a teacher at the high school she was kicked out of due misunderstanding with her teachers over injuring a group of male classmates. After getting her GED, she rejects job offers from other high schools and works on becoming a teacher at her old high school so she could work side by side with her high school love interest, the art teacher Ji Hyun Woo (Kim Da Hyun). However, the only thing that enables her to get the coveted job is by signing a contract to essentially babysit Park Tae In (Gong Yoo), a troublemaker who attends the same high school.
